definition: water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes
exterior surface/family relationship via females/to show (one's opinion)/a model/a table (listing information)/a form/a meter (measuring sth)
(Internet slang) (of the police) to ask to be let in on the pretext of checking the water meter/to barge into people's home on false pretences

sentences.english: This is a smart meter IC card , I have compiled can be used.
sentences.chinese: 这是一个IC卡智能水表程序，我已编译过可以用的。

sentences.english: The reaction at the surfacealso makes hydrogen sulfide eruptions visible in satellite imagery.
sentences.chinese: 在水表的这一反应也使硫化氢喷发可见于卫星图像。

sentences.english: The invention discloses a wireless and non-source water meter and gas meter.
sentences.chinese: 本发明公开了一种无线无源水表和气表。

sentences.english: The auxiliary line shall consist of an approved backflow preventer and water meter.
sentences.chinese: 辅助管路应该由通过认证的防回流阀和水表构成。

sentences.english: The experimental result demonstrates that the designed system can recognize watermeter measurement reading effectively.
sentences.chinese: 实验结果表明，该系统能有效地识别水表的计量读数。

sentences.english: When water meters are installed, it will be easy to tell how much water each home is using.
sentences.chinese: 安装上水表以后，就可以知道每户的用水量了。

sentences.english: Install – and carefully monitor – a water meter.
Intelligent type water meter does not show much market advantage.
sentences.chinese: 智能类水表并没有显示出多大市场优势。

sentences.english: Series 7 should be installed downstream of the water meter and of the water pressure regulator.
sentences.chinese: 系列7应该安装在水表和水压力调节器的下游。

sentences.english: In view of this, I started to smart meter hardware design and program development.
sentences.chinese: 鉴于此，我开始着手智能水表的硬件设计和程序开发。

sentences.english: Water meters should be with a totalizer mechanism completely waterproof.
sentences.chinese: 水表应该带有一个完全防水的累加器装置。
